The scene starts with Chris coming through the school's corridor.
He walks through it and greets many people.
Starr is standing at her locker.
When Chris walks towards her she turns away, but Chris puts his headphones on her ears.
Starr takes them down and tells him that she is still not okay with what he did the other day.
Chris says that he is sorry and explains why he thought it might be a good idea and tells Starr thethat he misses her a lot.
